com.kulana.core.foundation.listeners

Class AbstractTestListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.testng.TestListenerAdapter
      • com.kulana.core.foundation.listeners.TestArgsListener
        • com.kulana.core.foundation.listeners.AbstractTestListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.testng.IConfigurationListener, org.testng.IConfigurationListener2, org.testng.internal.IResultListener, org.testng.internal.IResultListener2, org.testng.ITestListener, org.testng.ITestNGListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    APITestListener, UITestListener

    public abstract class AbstractTestListener
extends TestArgsListener
    Base test listener for all types of tests, responsible for logging, results generation and retry logic.
    Author:
    Alex Khursevich
